text: The food is made by the Head Chef and owner John John himself!  it is made to order food at good prices!  I wish they had a dining area, it would completely enhance the experience.

The food is amazing. I've been coming here for years and has never had a single issue with any of my orders. Today I had a salmon salad and it was the bomb.com. The salmon was seasoned good and cooked just right. I understand why they've been able to remain open all these years.

This place is amazing. First, the owner is almost always there, very friendly and engaging and always courteous. The food is off the chain! Everything is cooked to perfection! I'm gonna need for you guys to hit up the west coast one day! Lol!
